altername_name: PokéPark Wii: La gran aventura de Pikachu
Poképark Wii: La gran aventura de Pikachu
name: PokéPark Wii: Pikachu's Adventure
overview: Only Pikachu Can Save the PokéPark! The first Pokémon adventure game on the Wii console puts Pikachu at the center of a fun, expansive playground filled with adventure, Attractions and Pokémon. The Rare Pokémon Mew summons Pikachu to the PokéPark to find the missing Sky Prism Pieces, leaving it up to Pikachu to save the day!
